CONSOLE WARNING: line 3078: Element.createShadowRoot is deprecated and will be removed in M73, around March 2019. Please use Element.attachShadow instead. See https://www.chromestatus.com/features/4507242028072960 for more details.
Tests what elements have focus after pressing tab.

INPUT:Filter Styles
BUTTON:Toggle Element State
BUTTON:Element Classes
BUTTON:New Style Rule
DIV:element.style {}
BUTTON:Select an element in the page to inspect it
DIV#tab-elements:Elements
BUTTON:Customize and control DevTools
LI:<span id="node-to-select">​</span>​

Shift+Tab:
